replies.body: Could we get any insight as to why the rules were more stringent before, and why they're being relaxed now? Not complaining, I'm just interested.

Hey Quinntuple Kill,

Player Support has gotten much better at detecting and resolving fraud and players have been asking for relaxed restrictions.  So we decided to make the change!

Wingfield

Riot has explicitely stated that nobody's going to get punished for a smurf or two. In fact, there's absolutely nothing against having a smurf. Riot can easily catch people who make smurfs, but why would they? There's nothing wrong with it. Most players have a smurf. I do. Half my friends do. 3/4 of the people on my friends list do. There's nothing wrong with gifting to yourself. In fact, there aren't many reasons aside from mystery gifting as to why you WOULD gift stuff to yourself.

"The Player receiving a Mystery gift must have at least 10 eligible content options".

This rule is great for curbing people from making smurf accounts, only buying champs that have a lot of uncommon "no longer available" skins, getting all those rare skins through mystery gifting and then selling that account on ebay for a profit.  BUT... kinda screws over people that own all the champions and have less than 10 skins left to obtain. 

Sure this probably only applies to a VERY tiny handful of people, but these people are your BIGGEST supporters and at the end of the day help keep your lights on.  Don't penalize them because others take advantage of the system.

I've brought this up to Riot before, and they haven't provided any solution other than to speak up in the forums and try to get support.  I doubt I will get any (I can hear the "First world problem" comments coming). 

Regardless... here I am, and this is my concern.

Have at it.

And lets be honest, someone who owns nearly every skin in the store, probably buys ultimate skins before most other players.  I am one of those small percentage of people that own all the champs and all but 10 skins....You know, I didnt even get a mystery gift from riot when they gave out the good behaviour awards.   

Makes me feel less valued because I spent too much money on the game.   :/
